component.name: com.google.Chrome.cripto.opensc
component.summary: This extension provides support for the OpenSC compatible tokens in Google Chrome.

description.p: To use this extension, ensure that the Google Chrome Flatpak is installed and that you have a compatible token. The tokens will be loaded by the p11-kit-proxy.so library. In case of issues, verify that the pcscd service is running on the host system (recommended version 2.3.0).
